languages.text: "Сколько еще ты намерен{mf||а} терпеть скверну на своем корабле, {name}? Подлую предательницу, что однажды уже затащила тебя в сети тьмы и чуть не обезглавила твой протекторат!"

"For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor, who has already dragged you into the darkness once and who almost left your protectorate without its sovereign!"
languages.original_text: "Сколько еще ты намерен{mf||а} терпеть скверну на своем корабле, {name}? Подлую предательницу, что однажды уже затащила тебя в сети тьмы и чуть не обезглавила твой протекторат!"

traits.locale_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor who had already dragged you into the darkness once and who had almost beheaded your protectorate!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor who had already dragged you into the darkness once and who had almost beheaded your protectorate!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，你还要纵容这个邪秽的异端到什么时候？这个无耻的叛徒曾将你拖下无尽的深渊，差点害得你的臣民失去他们的主君！”
languages.original_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor, who has already dragged you into the darkness once and who almost left your protectorate without its sovereign!"

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你还要纵容这个邪秽的异端到什么时候？这个无耻的叛徒曾将你拖下无尽的深渊，差点害得你的臣民失去他们的主君！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Cuánto tiempo va a seguir tolerando la presencia de esta escoria en su nave, {name}? ¡Esta vil traidora, que ya le ha arrastrado una vez a las tinieblas y que a punto ha estado de dejar su protectorado sin su {mf|soberano|soberana}!».
languages.original_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor, who has already dragged you into the darkness once and who almost left your protectorate without its sovereign!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuánto tiempo va a seguir tolerando la presencia de esta escoria en su nave, {name}? ¡Esta vil traidora, que ya le ha arrastrado una vez a las tinieblas y que a punto ha estado de dejar su protectorado sin su {mf|soberano|soberana}!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Combien de temps encore allez-vous tolérer cette vermine à bord de votre vaisseau, {name} ? Cette misérable traîtresse vous a déjà {mf|entraîné|entraînée} dans les ténèbres, manquant de plonger votre protectorat dans l'anarchie ! »
languages.original_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor, who has already dragged you into the darkness once and who almost left your protectorate without its sovereign!"

traits.locale_text: « Combien de temps encore allez-vous tolérer cette vermine à bord de votre vaisseau, {name} ? Cette misérable traîtresse vous a déjà {mf|entraîné|entraînée} dans les ténèbres, manquant de plonger votre protectorat dans l'anarchie ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie lange wollt Ihr diesen Dreck noch auf Eurem Schiff tolerieren, {name}? Diese üble Verräterin, die Euch bereits einmal in die Dunkelheit gezerrt hat, sodass Euer Protektorat fast {mf|seinen Souverän|seine Souveränin} verloren hätte!"
languages.original_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor, who has already dragged you into the darkness once and who almost left your protectorate without its sovereign!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie lange wollt Ihr diesen Dreck noch auf Eurem Schiff tolerieren, {name}? Diese üble Verräterin, die Euch bereits einmal in die Dunkelheit gezerrt hat, sodass Euer Protektorat fast {mf|seinen Souverän|seine Souveränin} verloren hätte!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「いつまでこの汚物を船に乗せておくおつもりですか、{name}様？この汚らわしい裏切り者は、すでに一度、あなたを暗闇に引きずり込み、危うく保護領を君主不在にするところだったのですよ！」
languages.original_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor, who has already dragged you into the darkness once and who almost left your protectorate without its sovereign!"

traits.locale_text: 「いつまでこの汚物を船に乗せておくおつもりですか、{name}様？この汚らわしい裏切り者は、すでに一度、あなたを暗闇に引きずり込み、危うく保護領を君主不在にするところだったのですよ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu pisliğin geminde kalmasına daha ne kadar izin vereceksin {name}? Seni daha önce bir kez karanlığa sürükleyen ve protektoranı hükümdarsız bırakmanın eşiğine iten bu pis haini diyorum!"
languages.original_text: "For how long are you going to tolerate this filth on your ship, {name}? This foul traitor, who has already dragged you into the darkness once and who almost left your protectorate without its sovereign!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu pisliğin geminde kalmasına daha ne kadar izin vereceksin {name}? Seni daha önce bir kez karanlığa sürükleyen ve protektoranı hükümdarsız bırakmanın eşiğine iten bu pis haini diyorum!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
